name: RioCan Real Estate Investment Trust
longDescription: Riocan Real Estate Investment Trust is a Canadian real estate investment trust which owns, develops, and operates Canada's portfolio of retail-focused, increasingly mixed-use properties. The REIT's property portfolio includes shopping centers and mixed-use developments, with most of its properties located in Ontario, Canada. Riocan's tenants consist of grocery stores, supermarkets, restaurants, cinemas, pharmacies, and corporates. By geography, the company operates in Canada, which generates the majority of total revenue, and in the United States.

fullAddress: 2300 Yonge Street,Suite 500, P.O. Box 2386, RioCan Yonge Eglinton Centre, Toronto, ON, CA
